metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4147 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple format string vulnerabilities in Yet Another Radius Daemon (YARD RADIUS) 1.1.2 allow context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via format string specifiers in a request in the (1) log_msg function in log.c or (2) version or (3) build_version function in version.c.

criterions.comment: yardradius: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
